name: Pyperfin
tagline: A python tool for managing your personal finance
body:
PyPerFin
========

A python tool for managing your personal finance

Developer Info
==============
This tool is developed by Swara Technologies. 

Contact Info
============
**email:** swaratechnologies@outlook.com

**website:** https://swaratechnologies.wordpress.com/

User Guide
==========
An user guide can be downloaded from [PyPerFin_UserGuide](http://swaratechnologies.files.wordpress.com/2013/05/pyperfin_userguide1.pdf)

Developer Guide
===============
An user guide can be downloaded from [PyPerFin_UserGuide](http://swaratechnologies.files.wordpress.com/2013/05/pyperfin_developerguide.pdf)
